name: Rothschild: The Sheep Will Wake
description: Rothschild: The Sheep will Wake is a first person horror game in which the Rothschild family dominates the world. The player fills the shoes of Jordan Baker, a journalist sent to investigate the hospitalization of Kane Rothschild. Little did he know, this rabbit hole just doesn't end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: AMD FX-6300 6-Core 3.7ghz or equivelant Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 200 series or equivelant DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
